entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chesterfield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:28 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -35.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chesterfield Inlet Airport 04:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Temperature: -35.5°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -39.5°C
Wind: NNW 29 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 39 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 39 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:33 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 50 this evening and minus 57 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:33 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 43.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. Temperature steady near minus 43. Wind chill minus 57 in the morning and minus 63 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:33 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
